New York University Abu Dhabi Library
Hisham Khatib Collection - Mediterranean Pilgrimage Association
Khatib, Hisham, Mr.
AD_MC_030_ref150
4 paige_boxes
2,789 Photographic Prints 22 albums, remainder loose prints.
1880s-1920s Generally good, some brittle and warped. Digital copy only: 030_ref150
Content Description
2,930 photographs and postcards (both individual prints and contained within albums) focussed on the Near East, including the Holy Land, Palestine, Jordan, Turkey, Syria and Egypt as well as a very small number from Europe.
Photographic Prints Albumen Prints Palestine Jordan Egypt Syria Lebanon Landscapes Archaeological Sites/Artifacts Postcards Khatib, Hisham, Mr.
